dataJson.description: A project built for freecodecamp.com in 2016, the requirement then were to build a Simon Says game
dataJson.name: Simon Game
dataJson.story: A Simon game. It uses Web Audio API. It was fun and a little challenging to make this one work. The main problem was to make the sound as long as the mouse button was pressed. The Web Audio API looks great and is easy to work with once you get the basics.

techs.description: A programming language used for scripting web browser
techs.name: Javascript

techs.description: A CSS library for responsive web design
techs.name: Bootstrap
